K

kchandra423.kColliders - package kchandra423.kColliders
Contains a set of classes for adding Collision detection to Movable KImages as efficiently as possible.
kchandra423.kImages - package kchandra423.kImages
Package of classes to draw a wide variety of Images, as well as provide clean and fast resizing methods.

Adds very basic physics to KImages.
